headline: Should Target’s (TGT) New Design and Merchandising Directors Reshape Its Post-CEO Transition Strategy?
summary: Target Corporation recently announced the past election of former NIKE chief innovation officer John Hoke III and former HanesBrands CEO and ex-Walmart chief merchandising officer Steve Bratspies to its Board of Directors, with Hoke joining on March 1 and Bratspies on April 1 to serve on key governance, compensation, audit, risk, infrastructure and finance committees. headline: Lululemon’s 50% Decline May Be Over as Reddit Sentiment Shifts To “Buy Now”
summary: Shares of Lululemon (NASDAQ:LULU) are trading at $192.47 after a brutal 50% decline over the past year, but retail investors on Reddit and X are signaling a shift in sentiment.
